newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: Woodchester H1 pre-tax profit up 25 pct.
newsitem.headline: Woodchester H1 pre-tax profit up 25 pct.

text.p: NOTE - Irish-based financial services group Woodchester Investments Plc is majority owned by French banking group Credit Lyonnais.

NOTE - Woodchester said the level of its new business advances had grown strongly, with total new business of almost 600 million Irish pounds written during the first half, an increase of 46 percent over the first half last year.
A record 120 million pounds of new business advances was achieved in August, it said.
"The economic outlook in all our market places remains favourable," Woodchester said.
It said its Danish and Portuguese businesses could now be expected to mae a meaningful contribution to group profits, and it was considering moving into another European country.
